it.polimi.ingsw.lim.model.leaders

Class LeaderCard.Builder<T extends LeaderCard.Builder<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.lim.model.leaders.LeaderCard.Builder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic builder passed from subclasses' builder instance
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivableLeader.Builder, PermanentLeader.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    LeaderCard

    public abstract static class LeaderCard.Builder<T extends LeaderCard.Builder<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Leaders are built with the builder pattern. The idea of using a generics T to instantiate subclasses with the builder comes from: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/17164375/subclassing-a-java-builder-class
